name: topsless
description: used for requests to get metadata from teemops e.g. amis

scripts.debug: export SLS_DEBUG=* &&  node  --trace-warnings --inspect node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline --httpPort 8081 --host 0.0.0.0 --stage dev --verbose
scripts.debugsso: eval $(aws configure export-credentials --profile tdev --format env) && export SLS_DEBUG=* &&  node  --trace-warnings --inspect node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline --httpPort 8081 --host 0.0.0.0 --stage dev --verbose
